ISceneLightDir Interface Reference
[SCENE+ Module]

import "sceneplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for ISceneLightDir:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

SCENE+ Directional Light.

A specialisation of the ISceneLight interface.

Call Create function to initialise the directional light source.

See also:
FreeWillPlus::SceneLightDir implementation class, which implements the directional light as a targeted object (IKineTargetedObj)

Definition at line 306 of file sceneplus.idl.

 Creates the directional light (details).

 Creates the directional light using the targeted object metaphore (details).

HRESULT GetCreateParams ([out] FWVECTOR *vDirection)
 Returns creation values; these values may defer from the given in Create depending on the actual implementation.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT ISceneLightDir::Create (  FWVECTOR  vDirection  ) 
 

Creates the directional light (details).

Parameters:
vDirection Direction of the light; directional lights have no source and therefore no position
Remarks:
This function may be called again to change the creation parameters

HRESULT ISceneLightDir::CreateEx (  FWVECTOR  vPosition,
FWVECTOR  vTarget
) 
 

Creates the directional light using the targeted object metaphore (details).

Parameters:
vPosition,vTarget are used to calculate Direction which is equal to Target - Position; directional lights have no source and so no more meaning these vectors have.
Remarks:
This function may be called again to change the creation parameters
